medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient began having epigastric abdominal pain this morning while watching TV. The pain is described as non-radiating and dull achy in nature. Eating worsens the pain, and there are no alleviating factors. The symptoms are similar to those experienced during a previous gastric ulcer episode.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Chronic kidney disease, gout, benign prostatic hyperplasia, hypertension, gastric ulcer, hyperlipidemia, anemia.
medical_history.family_history: No family history of pancreatic disease.
